Day Trip Planner: Signal Mountain

    #day-trips
Signal Mountain, Tennessee, offers a perfect blend of natural beauty, local culture, and scenic views. This day trip itinerary will guide you through a full day of exploration, from a delightful breakfast and refreshing hikes to exploring local venues and enjoying a riverside lunch. Whether you're a nature enthusiast, an art lover, or simply looking to relax, this guide ensures a memorable experience in Signal Mountain.

1.  Breakfast at Mayfly Coffee

Location: 1605 Taft Hwy, Signal Mountain, TN 37377
Time: 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM
Description: Start your day with a delicious breakfast at Mayfly Coffee. Enjoy their selection of freshly brewed coffees, breakfast sandwiches, and pastries in a cozy atmosphere.

2.  Visit Rainbow Lake Trail

Location: Ohio Ave, Signal Mountain, TN 37377
Time: 9:15 AM - 11:00 AM
Description: After breakfast, head to Rainbow Lake Trail for a refreshing hike. This trail is moderate in difficulty and offers beautiful views of the surrounding forests and the historic dam. The hike to the lake is about 2.5 miles round trip.

3.   Mountain's Arts Community Center

Location: Signal Mountain, TN
Time: 11:30 AM - 1:30 PM
Description: Spend the afternoon exploring some local venues. Consider visiting the Mountain Arts Community Center, which offers various art exhibits and classes. You can also explore some of the local shops in the area for unique finds and souvenirs.

4.  Lunch at River Drifters

Location: 1925 Suck Creek Rd, Chattanooga, TN 37405
Time: 2:00 PM - 3:30 PM
Description: Head to River Drifters for a relaxing lunch by the water. This riverside spot offers a variety of dishes, from burgers and sandwiches to fresh seafood. The serene view of the river enhances the dining experience.

5.  Visit Signal Point

Location: 116 Signal Point Rd, Signal Mountain, TN 37377
Time: 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM
Description: After lunch, visit Signal Point for a stunning panoramic view of the Tennessee River Gorge. This historic site is also the starting point for the Cumberland Trail, offering additional hiking opportunities if time allows.

6.  Grab a Beer and Dinner at Monkey Town Brewing Company

Location: 287 1st Ave, Dayton, TN 37321
Time: 5:30 PM - 7:00 PM
Description: Conclude your day with a visit to Monkey Town Brewing Company in nearby Dayton, TN. Enjoy a craft beer from their wide selection brewed on-site. The brewery also offers a variety of food options including burgers, sandwiches, wings, and more, making it a great place to have dinner as well.
This detailed itinerary ensures a full and enjoyable day exploring Signal Mountain, combining outdoor activities, local dining, and local experiences. Do you have a recommendation? Please reach out and let us know.
